definition: to speak/to explain/to negotiate/to emphasise/to be particular about/as far as sth is concerned/speech/lecture

sentences.english: Above all, expert estrade faces entire industry to open.
sentences.chinese: 首先，專家講壇是面向全行業開放的。

sentences.english: And he has what is called the bully pulpit.
The speaker mounted the rostrum amid warm applause.
sentences.chinese: 那位講演者在歡呼聲中登上了講壇。

sentences.english: Rinzai climbed down from the pulpit and passed through the crowd of monks to reach the questioner.
sentences.chinese: 臨濟從講壇上爬下來，穿過人羣來到發問者面前。

sentences.english: Hallam, which TV channel do you want to watch?
sentences.chinese: 我在看中央電視臺的百家講壇。
我在看中央電視臺的百家講壇。
百家講壇是一個開放的大學。

sentences.english: Get back in the bully pulpit and tell us what we need to do.
sentences.chinese: 請你回到天字一號講壇上，告訴大家需要做些什麼。

sentences.english: He elbowed his way through the crowd towards the rostrum.
sentences.chinese: 他用肘推著從人羣中向講壇擠過去。

sentences.english: From the rostrum he thundered at them and shook his fists.
sentences.chinese: 他從講壇上向他們大聲斥責，並且揮舞着拳頭。

sentences.english: Were you at home watching TV last night?
sentences.chinese: 我在看中央電視臺的百家講壇。

sentences.english: Legions of brave women wrote and lectured for change.
sentences.chinese: 衆多富於膽識的女性爲變革奮筆疾書，登上講壇。

sentences.english: Arguably, all he has left is the bully pulpit.
sentences.chinese: 按理說，留給他的只有這座天字一號的講壇。

sentences.english: Next, the content of expert estrade involves trade of whole and interactive entertainment.
sentences.chinese: 其次，專家講壇的內容涉及整個互動娛樂行業的。

sentences.english: Mr Ban is also expected to man the bully pulpit.
sentences.chinese: 人們期待潘就是天字第一號講壇。

definition: study of the Book of Changes 易經|易经[Yi4 jing1]
to pass on the light of Buddha
Yan Fu (1853-1921), influential Chinese writer and translator of Western books, esp. on social sciences
Nü Shu writing, a phonetic syllabary for Yao ethnic group 瑶族 瑤族 dialect designed and used by women in Jiangyong county 江永縣|江永县 in southern Hunan
